description.en: “I’ll wait for you,” whispers a mysterious, red-haired woman. So goes the recurring dream Jaesin Yang has had every night since the tragic massacre at the orphanage when he was a child. When he moves to the notoriously haunted Orchid Road to delve into the meaning behind his dreams, he is nearly killed by a vengeful demon on the first night. However, he is rescued by a beautiful woman named Socheon who looks just like the woman in his dreams. Together, they join forces to help innocent demons and fight against the demonic designs of Geumgwan, the lord of all demons.

The hilarious misadventures of the "Sket Dan"; a group of high-schoolers who help out people as part of their club activity. Himeko, the hot-headed ex-delinquent with a soft spot for cute things and a taste for strange food. Switch, the brainy otaku who only talks via a computerized speech-application. And Bossun, the atypical leader of this looney bunch, with the amazing power to… concentrate very hard!

- Won the 55th annual Shogakukan Manga Award in 2009 for best shounen manga.  


---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media Komputindo as **SKET DANCE** (2015)

**Links:**  
- [Author's Twitter](https://twitter.com/kentashinohara_)  
- [Anime on ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=12089)
description.ru:
"Скет Данс" - школьный клуб, чья деятельность весьма необычна - помогать в решении абсолютно любых проблем, которые возникли у учеников или даже учителей. А члены этого чудо-клуба, не менее странные личности, чем сам клуб: Боссун - гений дедуктивного мышления, Химэко - боевая единица группы и Свич - "мозг" и хакер мира сего. Вы всегда можете к ним обратиться, если осмелитесь…  
  
- Won the 55th annual Shogakukan Manga Award in 2009 for best shounen manga.  


---

**Links:**  
- [Author's Twitter](https://twitter.com/kentashinohara_)  
- [Anime on ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=12089)

description.en: Tomo Aizawa was able to successfully confess to her crush Junichirou Kubota. There is only one problem: He just sees her as his buddy. He thought that she was a boy until they went to middle school together, because her grade school was in a different school district.

altTitles.ja-ro: Love Riron

altTitles.vi: Học thuyết tình yêu

description.en:
Loser Yarahata Kanji can’t even have a normal conversation with a girl let alone have any kind of relationship with one. But one day a ghost named Aiya appears and declares that he has been tasked with the mission to change Kanji’s life. At this rate, the Yarahata name will not live on so Aiya will become a love education teacher and coach him on how to develop relationships with girls.  
  
The first hurdle comes when he starts a part time job at a convenience store and sees that his co-worker is a hot girl named Yoshizato Saki who also happens to be the store owner’s daughter. With the help of Aiya, Kanji, although stumbling along the way, has a conversation with her and builds a relationship. But he has miles to go if he wants to be the kind of person that can date beautiful women.

altTitles.ru: Рамия-Яна: Хроники Героя и Повелителя Демонов

altTitles.tr: Ramia-Yana; Kahraman ve İblis Lordu Günlükleri

altTitles.es-la: Ramia-Yana: Crónicas de la heroína Ramia & Lord de los Demonios

description.en:
Each time a Demon Lord has appeared, a human hero has slain it, pushing back the demons in the dark lands. 
As the cycle starts over again, a mysterious ancient hero called Ramia reappears. Meanwhile, an abnormal Demon army suddenly strikes the kingdom…
description.fr:
L'histoire fantastique de l'excentrique et mystérieuse héroïne Ramia et des démons qui s'opposent à elle.  


---

**Links:**  
- [Author's Twitter](https://twitter.com/TheGoldenSmurf)  
- [Author's Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/10669208)  
- [Author's Patreon](https://www.patreon.com/thegoldensmurf)
description.id:
Setiap kali seorang Raja Iblis memunculkan diri, seorang bahadur manusia telah tampak ’tuk menakluknya, mendorong mundur para iblis ke negeri gulita.
Dengan mulainya lagi daurnya, seorang bahadur kuno misterius bernama Ramia muncul kembali. Sementara itu, sebuah laskar Iblis taknormal tiba-tiba menyerang kerajaannya...
description.ru: Фэнтезийный эпос, посвященный необычному и таинственному герою по имени Рамия.
description.tr:
Ne zaman bir İblis Lordu ortaya çıksa, bir insan kahraman onu öldürerek karanlık topraklardaki iblisleri geri püskürtmüştür.
Döngü yeniden başlarken, Ramia adında gizemli bir antik kahraman yeniden ortaya çıkar. Bu sırada, anormal bir İblis ordusu aniden krallığa saldırır...
description.es-la:
Cada vez que aparecía un Lord de los Demonios, un héroe humano lo eliminaba, haciendo retroceder a los demonios a las tierras oscuras.
Mientras el ciclo empieza una vez más, una antigua y misteriosa heroína llamada Ramia reaparece. Y mientras tanto, un ejército anormal de Demonios azota repentinamente al reino...

altTitles.ja-ro: Hakaijuu

altTitles.th: พันธุ์นรกแตก

description.en:
Well… you lead quite a nice life… competing with friends… having your childhood friend - almost-girlfriend coming back to town… all your dreams are starting to come true… when suddenly the ground shakes and a shelf falls on your head…  
  
OK… you hit your head just now, right? So it should be quite reasonable that everything went nuts and people are being eaten right before your eyes…  
  
Right?

altTitles.ja-ro: Akame ga Kiru!

altTitles.en: Red Eyes Sword - Akame ga Kill ! (FRoff)

altTitles.th: อาคาเมะสวยประหาร

altTitles.vi: Akame ga kill!

description.en:
Tatsumi is a fighter who, accompanied by his two childhood friends, sets off to the Capital in search of a way to make money to assist his poverty-stricken village. After being separated from his friends, Tatsumi not only fails to enlist in the army, but is swindled out of all his money. He is then taken in by a noble family who offer him help; after finding himself in a messy situation Tatsumi is rescued by a group of assassins known as Night Raid, and is invited to join their ranks. Composed of the swordswoman Akame, a young woman armed with a huge pair of scissors named Sheele, the string manipulator Lubbock, the armored warrior Bulat, the sniper Mine, the beast fighter Leone and their leader Najenda, Night Raid is also part of the revolutionary forces assembled to overthrow Prime Minister Honest, who manipulates the young emperor for his and his men's personal gain, leading the rest of the nation to poverty and strife.  


---
description.ru:
Простой деревенский парень отправился в столицу, чтобы прославиться. Но что то пошло не так: его не взяли в армию, обокрали, а милая девушка, приютившая его, оказывается матерым убийцей в юбке, убившая его друзей. Но не все еще потеряно. Ему посчастливилось встретить членов группы ассасинов "Ночной Рейд". После этого дела пошли в гору.  
  
See [AnimeNewsNetwork](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=15919) for the anime.

altTitles.ja-ro: Imawa no Kuni no Alice Retry

altTitles.ja: 今際の国のアリス RETRY

altTitles.vi: Alice ở thế giới không lối thoát - LÀM LẠI

altTitles.ja-ro: Imawa no Kuni no Arisu RETRY

description.en: Arisu Ryouhei, now a grown adult and married to Yuzuha, who is expected to give birth to their first child any day now, suddenly finds himself back in the Borderlands, the land between Life and Death, after getting into an accident. Will he be able to make it out of the Borderlands once more…?
description.vi: Phần tiếp theo của Alice in Borderland. Arisu Ryohei, nay đã trưởng thành và đã kết hôn cùng Yuzuha, người đang mang thai đứa con sắp sửa chào đời của cậu, thế nhưng trớ trêu thay, trong một tai nạn, cậu lại một lần nữa bị đưa đến "Cận Tử Giới", một thế giới nằm giữa sự sống và cái chết. Liệu lần này cậu sẽ vẫn có thể tiếp tục sống sót mà rời khỏi "Cận Tử Giới" nữa hay không...? Về lý do nhóm dịch dùng cái tên "Cận Tử Giới": Imawa [今わ、今際]Khoảnh khắc cận tử - ranh giới giữa sống và chết ngay cuối phút trước khi lâm chung.

title.en: An Introvert's Hookup Hiccups: This Gyaru Is Head Over Heels for Me!

altTitles.ja: 陰キャの僕に罰ゲームで告白してきたはずのギャルが、どう見ても僕にベタ惚れです

altTitles.en: An Introvert's Hookup Hiccups: This Gyaru Is Head Over Heels for Me!
The Gal Who Was Meant to Confess to Me as a Punishment Game Has Apparently Fallen in Love with Me

altTitles.zh-hk: 因懲罰遊戲才向陰角的我告白的辣妹，怎麼看都已經完全迷戀上我了

altTitles.ko: 아싸인 내게 벌칙 게임으로 고백해 온 갸루가 아무리 봐도 나한테 반한 것 같다

altTitles.ru: Девушка, которая должна была признаться мне в качестве игрового наказания, очевидно, влюбилась в меня

altTitles.pl: Introwertyczne wpadki podrywowe: Ta Gyaru zakochała się we mnie po uszy!
Gal, która miała mi wyznać miłość w ramach gry z karą, najwyraźniej się we mnie zakochała.

altTitles.ja-ro: Inkya no Boku ni Batsu Game ni Kokuhaku Shitekita Hazu no Gyaru ga, Doumitemo Boku ni Betahore Desu

description.en:
When the gorgeous Nanami Barato confesses to Yoshin Misumai, it seems too good to be true! Only, it is—and Yoshin knows it. How’s an introverted guy like him supposed to keep his cool when he knows this is all just a dare? Even more puzzling, despite her gaudy appearance, this supposed gyaru isn’t actually all that good with guys! Perhaps this is the perfect chance for this shy guy to pluck up his own courage and say yes to the guy-shy girl. So begins their new cushy life of morning meet-ups and handmade lunches. The thing is, judging by the way she’s acting, Nanami has fallen head over heels for him! From dares and dating to downright disasters, can these two first-timers figure out their feelings and maybe even fall in love—for real, this time?!

---
**Links:**
- Official Video Manga - [YouTube](https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PL0zfSjyskgIUZdlu7xyxLAv956kN32dP6) (Chapters 1-3, With voice acting)
- [Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/series/an-introvert-s-hookup-hiccups)
description.ja:
**陰キャ×清楚ギャル、罰ゲームから始まるピュアラブコメ!!**

クラス内カーストトップの清楚ギャル・茨戸七海に罰ゲームで告白されて付き合うことになった陰キャ男子・簾舞陽信。 しかし罰ゲームのはずが、七海は陽信にガチ惚れしているようで…？
description.pl: Kiedy piękna Nanami Barato wyznaje miłość Yoshinowi Misumai, wydaje się to zbyt piękne, by mogło być prawdziwe! Tylko, że tak jest - i Yoshin o tym wie. Jak taki introwertyczny facet jak on ma zachować zimną krew, skoro wie, że to tylko wyzwanie? Jeszcze bardziej zastanawiające jest to, że pomimo jej krzykliwego wyglądu, ta rzekoma gyaru nie jest tak dobra w kontaktach z facetami! Być może jest to idealna okazja dla tego nieśmiałego faceta, aby zebrać się na odwagę i powiedzieć "tak" tej nieśmiałej dziewczynie. Tak zaczyna się ich nowe, wygodne życie porannych spotkań i ręcznie robionych lunchów. Rzecz w tym, że sądząc po jej zachowaniu, Nanami zakochała się w nim po uszy! Czy ta dwójka może odkryć swoje uczucia, a może nawet zakochać się w sobie - tym razem naprawdę?!
description.pt-br: Barato Nanami, uma versão atenuada da garota no topo da hierarquia da escola, perdeu um jogo de cartas e agora tem que confessar a um cara de sua classe como punição. Misumai Youshin, que é um solitário sem amigos, foi o cara escolhido, mas ele sabe da punição! Deveria ter sido uma punição do jogo, mas será que Nanami vai desenvolver sentimentos por Youshin…?

altTitles.th: คำอธิษฐานในวันที่จากลา Frieren

altTitles.el: Φρίρεν: Πέρα από το Τέλος του Ταξιδιού

altTitles.de: Frieren: Nach dem Ende der Reise

altTitles.es-la: Frieren: Más allá del fin del viaje

description.el: Έχοντας νικήσει τον βασιλιά των δαιμόνων, το ταξίδι μιας δεκαετίας φτάνει στο τέλος του και μια νέα εποχή ειρήνης ξεκινά. Η ζωή όμως συνεχίζεται, ειδικά για την Φρίρεν, πως ως ξωτικό έχει ακόμα αιώνες ζωής μπροστά της. Με τις δεκαετίες να περνάνε, η Φρίρεν έρχεται αντιμέτωπη με την μεταβλητότητα του κόσμου και την παροδικότητα των ανθρώπων. Μετά από μια τελευταία συνάντηση με όλη την παλιά της ομάδα, συνειδητοποιεί ότι ο χρόνος που πέρασε με τους φίλους της ήταν υπερβολικά σύντομος και ότι δεν θα έχει ποτέ την ευκαιρία να τους μάθει καλύτερα. Έρχοντας αντιμέτωπη με την αλήθεια αυτή, η Φρίρεν αποφασίζει να ξεκινήσει ένα ακόμα ταξίδι αλλά αυτή τη φορά έχοντας σκοπό να μάθει το τι σημαίνει να είσαι άνθρωπος.
description.en: The adventure is over but life goes on for an elf mage just beginning to learn what living is all about. Elf mage Frieren and her courageous fellow adventurers have defeated the Demon King and brought peace to the land. With the great struggle over, they all go their separate ways to live a quiet life. But as an elf, Frieren, nearly immortal, will long outlive the rest of her former party. How will she come to terms with the mortality of her friends? How can she find fulfillment in her own life, and can she learn to understand what life means to the humans around her? Frieren begins a new journey to find the answer.
description.es: Frieren es una elfa, y como para todos los de su raza, los años pasan en un suspiro… pero no es así para sus antiguos compañeros de batalla, a los que Frieren verá morir y envejecer. De repente Frieren se da cuenta de que pese a que la vida avanza a un ritmo más lento para ella, las experiencias con sus seres queridos se le escapan de las manos. Un aire nostálgico envuelve a este manga fantástico tan entrañable que ha vendido ya más de 2,5 millones de copias en Japón.
description.fr:
Que deviennent les héros une fois le mal vaincu ?
Dans ce coffret collector : un jeu de 54 cartes entièrement personnalisé aux couleurs de la série et le manga avec une jaquette alternative réversible !

Alors que Frieren et ses compagnons font halte dans la citadelle de Heiß, Stark propose à Fern d'aller en rendez-vous, sur le ton de la plaisanterie... et contre toute attente, la jeune fille accepte ! Sur les conseils de l'elfe, qui n'y connaît pas grand-chose, le guerrier emmène donc son amie faire le tour de la ville, ce qui leur permet de se rapprocher un peu.

Après cette pause bienvenue, les trois aventuriers repartent sur les routes et arrivent au haut-plateau du Nord, une zone extrêmement dangereuse où pullulent aussi bien des monstres coriaces que des démons retors... Parviendront-ils à survivre dans cette région hostile ?
description.es-la: Tras cumplir su misión de derrotar al Rey Demonio, la maga elfo Frieren, el héroe Himmel, el sacerdote Heiter y el guerrero Eisen regresan a casa después de un viaje de una década donde disolverán su grupo y tomarán sus propios caminos. Pero el tiempo pasa de forma distinta para los elfos, Frieren comienza a ser testigo de como sus excompañeros sufren sus estragos y comienzan a morir lentamente y uno a uno. Antes de fallecer, Heiter el sacerdote, le impone a Frieren un aprendiz humana llamada Fern. Llevados por la afición que tiene la alfa por recolectar hechizos mágicos, ambos emprenderán una aventura, llena de magia e introspección, que los llevará a revisitar lugares que había conocido en su anterior travesía, mientras enfrenta el pesar que le causa descubrir todas las posibilidades que ha desperdiciado en su viaje que le hubiesen posibilitado entablar una relación más cercana con sus compañeros ahora fallecidos.
description.zh-hk: 在打倒了魔王的勇者一行人当中，魔法使芙莉莲是精灵，她和其他三人有不一样的地方。 生活在“之后”的世界里，她感受到了什么—— 留下来的人们所编织的葬送与祈祷又意味着什么—— 故事从“冒险的结束”开始。 这是讲述英雄们的活法的，后日谈奇幻作品！

title.en: Suki na Ko ga Megane wo Wasureta

altTitles.ja: 好きな子がめがねを忘れた

altTitles.pt-br: A garota que eu gosto vive esquecendo os óculos

altTitles.zh: 喜欢的人忘记戴眼镜了

altTitles.zh-hk: 喜歡的女孩把眼鏡忘記了

altTitles.ja-ro: Suki na Ko ga Megane wo Wasureta

altTitles.vi: Cô Bạn Tôi Thầm Thích Lại Quên Mang Kính Rồi

altTitles.en: The Girl I Like Forgot Her Glasses

altTitles.de: The Girl I Like Forgot Her Glasses

altTitles.es-la: La chica que me gusta olvidó sus lentes

description.en:
Komura is a middle school boy who is head-over-heels in love with his next-seat neighbor Mie, a girl with terrible eyesight who just can't get used to carrying her glasses, often leaving them at home, or accidentally breaking them. He opts to help her as much as he possibly can, and through those efforts, she begins getting acquainted with his kindness. Will she reciprocate?

---
A delightfully charming romantic comedy about a boy who only has eyes for the girl who always forgets her glasses!

With the new school year comes a new homeroom, new classmates, and a new desk for the timid Komura. But any trepidation he might've felt quickly dissipates when he catches sight of Mie, his new seat neighbor.

Apt to quietly blurt out the most random things, the quirky Mie wears thick glasses that accentuate her lovely eyes, making Komura’s heart skip a beat!

Unfortunately, Mie is pathologically forgetful and can never seem to remember to bring her glasses to class. It's not all bad, though! Her resulting squinty, mean-girl face sends Komura’s heart into overdrive too!

While Komura is keen to help out and share his textbooks with Mie, will his heart give out from the almost daily strain of being up close and personal with his crush?!
description.fr:
Entre eux deux, c’est l’amour flou !

Mie, la voisine de classe de Komura, a oublié ses lunettes. Encore. Déjà troublé rien qu’en la voyant le jeune homme fait de son mieux pour aider sa camarade tête en l’air.Mais, dans un effort désespéré d’y voir plus clair, Mie se retrouve très près de lui… beaucoup trop près ! Komura ne sait plus comment réagir à cette soudaine proximité. Au propre comme au figuré, c’est l’occasion pour lui de se rapprocher !
description.ja:
隣の席の女の子がめがねを忘れた。
フォローしてあげたい小村くんだけど、見ようと一生懸命な彼女の距離が近すぎて ── 。
Twitterで話題沸騰 のゼロ距離ラブコメ♪
description.ru:
Комуре очень нравится его одноклассница Мия-сан, он просто без ума от нее и считает миленькой, несмотря на то, что Мия-сан очень близорука и носит толстенные очки. Но когда она однажды забывает их дома, и становится все ближе к Комуре в буквальном смысле, Комура познает всю силу своей любви к ней.  
  


---
description.uk: Комура Каеде вчиться в середній школі і з головою закоханий в свою однокласницю, Мію Аі, яка сидить поруч з ним. В дівчинки дуже поганий зір і без окулярів вона нормально не бачить, але часто забуває чи ламає їх. Комура хоче їй допомогти скільки може і так Мія дізнається про його доброту. Чи віддячить вона?
description.es-la: Una historia simple pero agradable... Los días normales de Komura-kun, quien ayuda a su compañera Mie-san, la cual tiene que usar lentes y siempre termina olvidándolos o hay algún suceso que evita su visibilidad... Estos sucesos los llevarán a entablar una amistad y también podría llegar a ser... ¿Amor?
description.pt-br: Komura é um garoto do fundamental que está perdidamente apaixonado por sua vizinha de cadeira Mie, uma garota com uma visão terrível que simplesmente não consegue se acostumar a carregar seus óculos, muitas vezes deixando eles em casa ou quebrando acidentalmente. Ele opta por ajudá-la tanto quanto possível e, por meio desses esforços, ela começa a se familiarizar com sua bondade.

altTitles.ja: 見るからに怪しい二人

description.en:
A lazy surreal comedy about two men who look like bad guys, but are actually super nice!

Two suspicious-looking men, one long-haired and the other short-haired, appear in the usual park.They look suspicious and unapproachable, but they are good guys themselves, picking up litter and searching for missing cats!

Long-Hair somehow knows a lot about the life span of snakes and the organs of rabbits, while Short-Hair is questioned by the police even though he is just eating a meat bun.The two of them live at their own pace today, involving various people in town.
description.ja:
悪人にしか見えないけど、実は超いい人たち!?によるダラダラシュールコメディ！

いつもの公園に出没する謎の長髪と短髪。

見た目は怪しさ満点で近寄りがたいが、ポイ捨てされたゴミを拾ったり行方不明の猫を捜索してあげたりとやっていることは善人そのもの。

なぜか蛇の寿命やウサギの器官に詳しい長髪と、肉まんを食べているだけなのに職質されてしまう短髪。

title.en: Infinite Stratos - My Older Sister Can't Be This Overprotective (Doujinshi)

altTitles.vi: Infinite Stratos ~ Chị gái tôi không thể bảo vệ tôi quá mức như vậy

description.vi: Chị gái, Ichika và công việc nhà đầu tiên của cậu

altTitles.th: ขบวนการกำมะลอ

altTitles.ja-ro: Sentai Daishikkaku

description.en:
Thirteen years ago, suddenly the Villainous Army of evil appeared in their gigantic floating castle 10000 meters in the sky to invade Earth!

The villainous army have reviving capabilities that make them immortal, making them a serious threat to humanity. To protect us against these invaders, the Divine Dragon Rangers, the Dragon Keepers, wield their miraculous powers and their weapons, Divine Tools, and continuously fight for our safety!

The assault of the Villainous Army! The vigilance of the Dragon Keepers! Will they succeed in their conquest…?

From Haruba Negi, the creator of *5Toubun no Hanayome*, comes the action-packed superhero series of a lifetime!
description.es: ¡Hace trece años, el Ejército Villano del mal apareció de repente en su gigantesco castillo flotante a 10.000 metros en el cielo para invadir la Tierra! El ejército villano tiene capacidades de revivir que los hacen inmortales, lo que los convierte en una seria amenaza para la humanidad. Para protegernos de estos invasores, los Rangers Dragón Divino, los Guardianes del Dragón, empuñan sus poderes milagrosos y sus armas, las Herramientas Divinas, ¡y luchan continuamente por nuestra seguridad! ¡El asalto del Ejército Villano! ¡La vigilancia de los Guardianes del Dragón! ¿Tendrán éxito en su conquista? ¡Descúbrelo en la serie de superhéroes llena de acción de toda la vida!
description.fr:
Il y a 13 ans, un château flottant est apparu à 1000 mètres au-dessus du sol et une armée maléfique est venue dans le but d'envahir l'humanité.
Afin de protéger l'humanité contre ces envahisseurs, des super-héros se battent, mais les choses ne semblent pas être comme elles le paraissent !
description.ru: Тринадцать лет назад армия монстров таинственным образом объявилась на территории людей, паря в воздухе на своем летучем замке! Армия монстров обладает различными способностями, которые могут грозить человеческой безопасности. Дабы защитить мирных жителей от вторжения на землю, доблестные герои - Хранители Дракона в составе из пяти человек выходят на поле правосудия! Используя свой туз в рукаве под названием «артефакт», боевой отряд героев из года в год, каждое воскресенье усмиряет неугомонных монстров. Однако, спустя 999 поражений, один из членов команды монстров решает отомстить героям!.. С этого момента и разворачивается наша история борьбы добра со злом!
description.pt-br: Há treze anos, de repente, o Infame Exército do mal apareceu em seu gigantesco castelo flutuante 10.000 metros no céu para invadir a Terra! O exército vilão tinha capacidades de reviver, o que os tornava imortais, tornando-os uma séria ameaça para a humanidade. Para nos proteger contra esses invasores, os Divine Dragon Rangers, os Dragon Keepers, manejam seus poderes milagrosos e suas armas, Ferramentas Divinas, e lutam continuamente por nossa segurança! O ataque do Exército Vilão! A vigilância dos Dragon Keepers! Eles terão sucesso em sua conquista...?

title.en: Shiori Experience: My Plain Self and an Odd Old Man

altTitles.ja-ro: Shiori Experience - Jimi na Watashi to Hen na Ojisan

altTitles.ja: SHIORI EXPERIENCE ~ジミなわたしとヘンなおじさん~
シオリエクスペリエンス  ~ジミなわたしとヘンなおじさん~

altTitles.ru: Shiori Experience: незаурядный Джими и заурядная Я

altTitles.uk: Досвід Шіорі ~Джимі, я і дивний дядько~

description.en:
Shiori was once a guitarist in a light music club in high school. But her first live performance was dashed when her brother ran away from home with a lot of debt, to become a musician in Tokyo.  
  
A decade later, Shiori is now a high school teacher, leading a boring, uneventful life and paying off the debt… till she runs into the ghost of none other than a famous guitarist Jim-you-know-who.  
  
A story of a 27-year-old woman on her way to a music legend begins here.
description.ru: История о Шиори, скромной и неуклюжей 27-летней школьной учительнице, которая любит играть на гитаре и общается с призраком Джими Хендрикса.
description.pt-br: Shiori era uma guitarrista em um clube de música no colégio. Mas sua primeira apresentação ao vivo foi frustrada quando seu irmão fugiu de casa deixando um monte de dívidas para se tornar um músico em Tóquio. Uma década depois, Shiori é agora uma professora do ensino médio, levando uma vida monótona e entediante pagando as dívidas... Até ela dar de cara com o fantasma de ninguém menos que um famoso guitarrista chamado Jim-você-sabe-quem. A história de uma mulher de 27 anos de idade, a caminho de uma lenda musical começa aqui.

description.en:
Kaizaki Arata is a 27-year-old unemployed man who, after quitting his last job after three months, has failed every interview since. Enter Yoake Ryou; representative of the ReLIFE Organization. He offers Kaizaki a pill that changes his appearance to that of his 17-year-old self; thus, Kaizaki becomes the subject of a one-year experiment in which he begins his life as a third year high school student once again.

---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Eaststar Adhi Citra (2016)

altTitles.ja: かわいそうな妹ちゃん

altTitles.ja-ro: Kawaisou na Imoutochan

altTitles.vi: Cô em gái rất yêu anh mình

description.en: Poor little sister who loves her onii-chan

title.en: Isshou Hatarakitakunai Ore ga Classmate no Daininki Idol ni Natsukaretara

altTitles.ja: 一生働きたくない俺が、クラスメイトの大人気アイドルに懐かれたら

altTitles.vi: Cô nàng idol đói bụng và anh chàng yêu nội trợ

altTitles.en: A Very Popular Idol Classmate Has Taken a Liking to Me, A Person Who Doesn’t Want to Work for my Whole Life

altTitles.ja-ro: Isshou Hatarakita Kunai Ore ga, Classmate no Daininki Idol ni Idakaretara

altTitles.zh: 班里的人气偶像黏上了一辈子不想工作的我

altTitles.vi: Siêu Idol Cùng Lớp Lại Thích Một Người Như Tôi?

description.en: Rintaro Shido, a high school student who aspires to become a full-time househusband, is in the class with a very popular idol, Rei Otosaki. The two have no connection other than being classmates, but their relationship changes drastically when Rintaro serves Rei a home-cooked meal after she nearly collapses from hunger! The food was so delicious that Rei said, "Can I come here every day to eat?"...?!
description.ja: 専業主夫を目指す高校生・志藤凛太郎のクラスには、世間でも大人気のアイドル・乙咲玲が在籍していた。同級生であること以外の関係がない二人だったが、空腹で倒れそうになった玲に凛太郎が手料理を振る舞ったことで関係は一変！ あまりの美味しさに玲は「毎日食べに来ていい？」と言ってきて……!?
description.vi: Shido Rintaro, nam sinh cao trung ước ao trở thành một ông chồng nội trợ, học cùng lớp với idol nổi tiếng Otosaki Rei. Cả hai không liên quan gì đến nhau trừ việc học cùng lớp. Đó là cho đến khi Rei xém ngất xỉu vì đói, và được Rintaro nấu ăn cho. Tay nghề cậu ta khá đến nỗi Rei quyết định sẽ đến ăn chực mỗi ngày...!?
description.pt-br: Rintaro Shido, um estudante do ensino médio que aspira se tornar um dono de casa em tempo integral, está na classe de uma idol muito popular, Rei Otosaki. Os dois não têm nenhuma conexão além de serem colegas de classe, mas seu relacionamento muda drasticamente quando Rintaro serve uma refeição caseira para Rei depois que ela quase desmaia de fome! A comida estava tão deliciosa que Rei disse: "Posso vir aqui todos os dias para comer?"...?!

title.en: Fate/Grand Order - Shiritsu Chaldea Gakuen ni Youkoso! (Doujinshi)

altTitles.ja: 私立カルデア学園にようこそ！ (Fate/Grand Order)

altTitles.ja-ro: Shiritsu Chaldea Gakuen ni Youkoso! (Fate/Grand Order)

altTitles.vi: Chào mừng đến với học viện Chaldea

description.en: [FGO doujinshi] A story about Fujimaru Ritsuka when he transfer to Chaldea Academy
description.vi: [FGO doujinshi] Câu chuyện về chàng trai Fujimaru Ritsuka khi cậu chuyển đến học viện Chaldea

altTitles.ja-ro: Kono Oto Tomare! Sounds of Life

description.en: Since the graduation of the senior members of the club, Takezou ends up being the sole member of the "Koto" (traditional Japanese string instrument) club. Now that the new school year has begun, Takezou will have to seek out new members for the club, or the club will be terminated. Out of nowhere, a new member barges into the near-abandoned club room, demanding to join the club. How will Takezou be able to keep his club alive and deal with this rascal of a new member?

altTitles.es-la: Yo maté al jugador de la Academia

altTitles.en: I Killed the Player of the Academy

description.en: Being a character of your favorite game is great! Sure, he’s just a minor NPC, but Corin knows this game like the back of his hand. With his knowledge and the main player Sihu’s abilities, everything’s going smoothly - until Corin discovers Sihu’s been murdering innocent NPCs and stealing their items. Horrified but powerless to stop him, Corin awaits the end of the game - only for Sihu to mysteriously fail at the last mission. Instantly, Corin travels three years back in time. Now, he’s determined to kill Sihu and take on his role - defeat the final boss and save the world.
description.ko:
플레이어를 죽였다.
죽일 만한 놈이었다. 아주 X새끼였거든.

title.en: Fate Has a Strange, Strange Taste

altTitles.ja-ro: En wa Inamono Aji na Mono

altTitles.ru: У судьбы есть причуды, а у причуд свой вкус

description.en: A girl from the Edo era somehow time-travels to modern Japan and finds the reincarnation of her dead lover in Tokyo… a middle school kid. He wants nothing to do with her. A little "get to know you" story.
description.ru: Девушка из эпохи Эдо каким-то образом путешествует во времени в современную Японию и находит реинкарнацию своего мертвого любовника в Токио... мальчика из средней школы. Он не хочет иметь с ней ничего общего.

title.en: The Demon Sword Master of Excalibur Academy

altTitles.ja-ro: Seiken Gakuin no Maken Tsukai

altTitles.ru: Мастер демонического клинка из академии «Святого Меча»

altTitles.vi: Ma Kiếm Sư Tại Học Viện Thánh Kiếm

description.en: In the fantasy story, the demon king Leonis sealed himself away for 1,000 years in order to prepare for the final battle, but when he woke up, he found himself in the body of a 10-year-old boy. A beautiful young woman named Lisellia from the Holy Sword Academy then says to him, "Why were you locked up in such a place? It's OK now, this big sister will take care of you!" Under Lisellia's care, Leonis is shocked to see that the world has completely changed. Bewildered and confused, Leonis finds himself enrolling at the Holy Sword Academy.
description.ja: 来たるべき決戦に備え、自らを封印した魔王レオニスは、目覚めるとなぜか少年の姿になっていた!

altTitles.ja-ro: Koohii o Shizuka ni

description.en: Hatano Takaki is a third-year in high school who can’t wait to become a “real adult”. One day, he passes by a café and finds himself mysteriously drawn to the proprietress, a mysterious woman who seems to be hiding a secret sadness. Through her, through coffee, and through his encounters with the other café patrons, he begins to taste the bittersweet feelings of love and growing up.

altTitles.ja: サキュバスがやってきたお話

altTitles.vi: Chuyện nàng Succubus

altTitles.en: The Story of a Succubus Who Came to the Human World

description.en: The story of a Succubus who comes to the human world to absorb life force energy. Accidentally, she lives as a child in a strange man's house.

altTitles.ja-ro: Sudachi no Maoujou

altTitles.en: The Leaving The Nest Demon King Castle

altTitles.vi: Lâu Đài Ma Vương Sudachi

description.en: The Hero defeated the Demon King and the world became peaceful. Despite this, a boy from Outset Village, Murabito, is in trouble. It's too peaceful for his item shop, Leaving The Nest Shop, to have any customers! If nothing is done, his store will have to be closed! What is the identity of the girl who appeared at that time…!?
description.ja: 勇者が魔王を倒し、世界は平和になった――にもかかわらず、道具屋・すだち屋を営むムラビトは困っていた。平和すぎてお客さんが全然来ないのである！ このままでは閉店まっしぐら‥‥ そんな時に現れた少女の正体は、死んだはずの魔王で‥！？

title.en: Witches Fly Through the Sky on Brooms

altTitles.ja-ro: Majo wa Houki de Sora o Tobu

altTitles.ja: 魔女はホウキで空を飛ぶ

altTitles.vi: Những phù thủy cưỡi chổi bay xuyên qua bầu trời

description.en: A backup on a middle school baseball team begs a witch to help him hit a home run.

The story centers on Minemori Kotoha, a woman who has been offered work at Suma Research Company's "Anti-Detective Section," and Sasaki Rena, its only investigator. This section focuses on rooting out corrupt detectives and removing them from their positions.   
  
While the two women spend their days investigating crooked cops, a new criminal is beginning to make his move…
description.uk: Історія зосереджується на Мінеморі Котосі, жінці, якій було запропоновано роботу в "Анти-детективному відділі", та Сасакі Рені, його єдиному слідчому. У цьому відділі основна увага приділяється викоріненню продажних детективів та зняття їх з посади. Коли дві жінки проводять свої дні, розслідуючи недобросовісних поліцейських, новий злочинець робить свій хід...

title.en: Kono Sekai de Ore dake ga "Level Up" wo Shitteiru

altTitles.ja: この世界で俺だけが【レベルアップ】を知っている

altTitles.ja-ro: Kono Sekai de Ore Dake ga Level Up wo Shitteiru

altTitles.en: Only I Know About "Leveling Up" in This World
Only I Know About "Level Up" in This World

altTitles.vi: Thế Giới Chỉ Mình Tôi Level Up

description.en:
–A world where the worth of one’s life is decided by one’s Level.

Theo, an S-Rank adventurer, had reincarnated thousand years later in a future where the people had forgotten about the power called “Level Up”. In this world where a person would be Level 1 at birth, humanity is persecuted as the weakest race and the people lived everyday while fearing the danger of monsters. However, in their midst only Theo, who was chosen to be a sacrifice for the monsters, knew that humans can become the strongest because only they have the ability to Level Up.

title.en: Fate/Grand Order: Fujimaru Ritsuka Doesn't Get it

altTitles.ja-ro: Fate/Grand Order: Fujimaru Ritsuka wa Wakaranai

altTitles.ja: Fate/Grand Order 藤丸立香はわからない

altTitles.fr: Fate/Grand Order : Ritsuka Fujimaru n’a rien pigé

description.en: Ritsuka Fujimaru—humanity's last master. It would not have been possible to restore humanity without him. However, he does have a shortcoming... he is far too honest! A slapstick comedy in which Fujimaru's simple questions sway the heroic spirits!

altTitles.zh: 爱相随LovePlus 爱花相随篇

description.en: Based on DS Dating Sim "LovePlus".

altTitles.ja-ro: Okaa-san (10-sai) to Boku

altTitles.vi: Mẹ (10 tuổi) và tôi

description.en: Haru-kun is a transfer student who moved into a new town with his mother. One day his mother suddenly turned into the same age as him.
description.vi: Haru - kun cùng mẹ đến thị trần mời. Rồi một ngày, cậu thấy mẹ mình bị teo nhỏ thành một cô nhóc 10 tuổi, bằng tuổi cậu

altTitles.en: BM อสูรพันธุ์เขมือบโลก

description.en:
Man is having a hard time finding food and getting rid of their trash, so science comes up with a bio-engineered animal that survives by eating trash, and is then killed to feed humanity. But the self-replicating, endlessly hungry killing machine gets loose in Tokyo…  
  
 [Official Thai](http://www.mebooktohand.com/product/39/bm-%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%AA%E0%B8%B9%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%9E%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%98%E0%B8%B8%E0%B9%8C%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%82%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%B7%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%9A%E0%B9%82%E0%B8%A5%E0%B8%81-1-12-%E0%B8%88%E0%B8%9A)
description.pt-br: A sociedade está tendo dificuldades para encontrar alimentos e se livrar do lixo, assim os cientistas japoneses conseguem criar uma criatura com bio-engenharia que se desenvolve comendo lixo e depois é morto para alimentar a sociedade. O problema começa quando essas criaturas auto-replicantes com uma fome infinita de matar e comer se solta na cidade de Tóquio.

altTitles.ja-ro: Jijyou wo Shiranai Tenkousei ga Guigui Kuru

altTitles.pt: O Aluno Sem Noção Transferido É Assertivo

altTitles.ja: 事情を知らない転校生がグイグイくる。

altTitles.zh-hk: 什麼情況都不知道的轉校生一個勁的湊過來。

altTitles.uk: Цей безглуздий переведений учень такий настирливий.

altTitles.en: The Clueless Transfer Student Is Assertive.

altTitles.pt-br: Meu Primeiro Amigo é um Tapado

description.en: Akane Nishimura is a shy and gloomy elementary school girl with an unfounded dire reputation in her class due to her appearance. Taiyou Takada is a transfer student in her class who came from a small countryside school, and who is fascinated by the aspects of Nishimura that her classmates use to pick on her, finding her "darkness" cool beyond compare. Through the unbridled and fundamental joy Takada finds in being her friend, Nishimura starts realizing that being herself is not as bad as she thinks.
description.uk: Акане Нішімура — сором’язлива та похмура дівчинка початкової школи, яка через свою зовнішність має безпідставну жахливу репутацію у своєму класі. Тайо Такада — новий учень, який перевівся з невеликої сільської школи, і якому подобається унікальність Нішімури, яку її однокласники використовують, щоб познущатися з неї, вважаючи, що її «темрява» виглядає моторошно. Через нестримну та фундаментальну радість, яку проявляє Такада, будучи її другом, Нішімура починає розуміти, що бути собою не так вже й погано, як вона думала.
description.pt-br: Nishimura é uma garota retraída, hostilizada por todos os colegas por seu jeito sombrio, que dizem até que ela é a Morte em pessoa. Mas isso só chama ainda mais a atenção de Takada, um novo aluno transferido. Sem saber o motivo do apelido, que por sinal ele acha super-maneiro, Takada começa a se aproximar mais e mais da Nishimura para se tornar amigo dela. Uma história cativante, cheia de nostalgia dos nossos tempos de fundamental, sobre uma amizade que vai aquecer seus corações!

altTitles.ja-ro: Yamada-kun to Nananin no Majo

altTitles.th: ยามาดะกับแม่มดทั้ง 7

altTitles.vi: Yamada và thất phù thủy

description.en: Ryu Yamada is a second year student at Suzaku High. Ryu is always late for school, naps in class and gets abysmal grades. His life is a dead bore. The beautiful Urara Shiraishi, on the other hand, is Suzaku High's brightest student. One day, without explanation, their bodies are swapped! Ryu ends up in Urara's body, and Urara in Ryu's.
description.ru: Ямада Рю - ученик старшей школы Сузаку. Он всегда опаздывает в школу, спит на уроках, получает ужасные оценки. Его жизнь скучна до невозможности. Шираиши Урара, его одноклассница - лучшая ученица в школе, красавица, знающая себе цену. Им наплевать друг на друга, они абсолютно противоположны и даже ни разу не сказали друг другу и слова. Школа это единственное что их хоть как-то связывало. И так бы эта история и закончилась, если бы из-за нелепой случайности…
description.pt-br: Ryu Yamada é um estudante do segundo ano da Suzaku High. Ryu está sempre atrasado para a escola, dorme durante a aula e tira notas péssimas. Sua vida é um tédio mortal. Por outro lado, a bela Urara Shiraishi, é a aluna mais brilhante da Suzaku High. Um dia, sem explicação, seus corpos são trocados! Ryu acaba no corpo de Urara e Urara no de Ryu.

title.en: How the Little Brother Who Turned Into a Girl Became His Big Brother's Girlfriend

altTitles.ja: 兄貴の彼女になる、女の子になっちゃった弟。

altTitles.ja-ro: Aniki no Kanojo ni Naru, Onnanoko ni Nacchatta Otouto

altTitles.en: When I Returned Home for the First Time in a Long Time, My Brother Transformed Into a Girl

altTitles.ja: 久しぶりに実家に帰ったら弟がTSしてた。

altTitles.ja-ro: Hisashiburi ni Jikka ni Kaettara Otouto ga TS Shiteta.

altTitles.ru: Как Младший Братик, Который Превратился в Девочку, Стал Девушкой Своего Старшего Брата

description.en:
When I returned home for the first time in a long time, my little brother transformed into a girl!?

---

[Fantia 18+ Content](https://mangadex.org/title/7a23de9c-01b8-43bd-ac38-0bfe0bebcc3b)
description.id: Ketika aku pulang ke rumah setelah sekian lamanya adik tiri laki-laki ku berubah menjadi gadis!?
description.ru: Когда я вернулся домой в первый раз спустя долгое время, мой младший брат стал девушкой!?

description.en: While many of us would probably scream at even the thought of a ghost being near us, Freshman Nimura Kensuke just thinks of it as a common everyday thing, seeing as how he has the uncanny ability to see so many of them on a daily basis. Things soon heat up for him when he meets a girl who changes his life from then on. Her name’s Kagura, and she has the power to summon a mighty “spirit devourer”–otherwise known as a “Ga-rei”–called Byakuei. So, what’s Nimura to do? Chase down the evil spirits and have Kagura summon the Ga-rei to devour them, of course! Now, come feast on their adventures like some ravenous Ga-rei!

altTitles.ja-ro: Pokemon - Ouja no Saiten (dj)

description.en:
The Indigo League: the ultimate challenge for Pokémon trainers. Structured like a massive tournament, anyone eager to show off their Pokémon can participate, from rookies to gym leaders to even the Elite Four themselves.  
  
This is the story of Red, Blue, and Green, three friends who decide to partake in the tournament.

Daily Chaldea is an unofficial daily slice-of-life fancomic created using art assets from the game Fate/Grand Order and building upon the existing lore of the franchise.

The story follows the adventures of genderswapping protagonist Ritsuka Fujimaru and the many Servants they've summoned, with the tone ranging from comedic to philosophical. The comic is 'live' with the NA server of Fate/Grand Order, with new characters appearing in the comic around the time they appear in the game and comics often referencing recent events in the game.

Enjoyment of this comic relies heavily upon the reader's familiarity with the game and its characters, so the author recommends playing Fate/Grand Order before reading this comic.

---

This comic is being uploaded to MangaDex by reader request and with the approval of MangaDex staff. All art is copyright TYPE-Moon / FGO Project, Aniplex Inc., Lasengle, and other copyright holders as appropriate. This comic is not for profit (through ad revenue or otherwise).

Some early use the original white backgrounds. Later comics have darker backgrounds and additional art assets for improved quality.

altTitles.vi: Centuria

description.en: Stowing himself away on a slave ship, Julian sets sail for the great continent with a hundred slaves, all yearning for freedom, until...?! Embark on a groundbreaking journey through this action-packed dark fantasy saga!!

altTitles.vi: Đảo Thiên Đường

altTitles.th: หายนะเกาะสวรรค์

altTitles.ja: バイオハザード ～ヘヴンリーアイランド～

description.en:
The story centers around the film crew for Idol Survival, the internationally popular television program where swimsuited idols compete in games. The crew arrives on the same isolated South American island that TerraSave member Claire Redfield is visiting on an investigation.  
  
The manga has some minor ties to the video games Resident Evil: Revelations 2, Umbrella Corps and Resident Evil 7: Biohazard.

title.en: Yarinaoshi Reijou wa Ryuutei Heika wo Kouryaku-chuu

altTitles.ja: やり直し令嬢は竜帝陛下を攻略中

altTitles.en: The Do-Over Damsel Conquers the Dragon Emperor
The Returnee Noble Lady in the Middle of Conquesting His Majesty the Dragon Emperor

altTitles.es: ¡Vence al Emperador Dragón en esta ronda, Señorita!

altTitles.zh: 重生大小姐正在攻略龙帝殿下

altTitles.en: Win Over the Dragon Emperor This Time Around, Noble Girl!

altTitles.vi: Tiểu Thư Trùng Sinh chinh phục Long Đế Bệ Hạ
小姐重生征服龍帝陛下 (Nom Script)

altTitles.id: Seorang Putri Yang Kembali Ke Masa Lalu Sedang Menaklukkan Kaisar Naga

description.en:
The curtains rise on the tale of a young lady who once stormed the battlefields now getting to start her life all over again!  
  
The young noblewoman, Jill, was sentenced to death by her fiancé, the Crown Prince. Just as she was on the brink of death, time rewinds back to when she was 10 years old, to the party where her engagement had been decided!   
  
Determined to avoid going down the same path to ruin, Jill hastily proposes to the person behind her, only to discover that he’s none other than Hades, the Emperor of the neighboring kingdom who’s (set to) fall into darkness, ergo the worst villain.
description.id:
Jill Savelle- seorang tunangan dari pangeran putra mahkota Gerald de Kleitos yang memiliki gelar "Dewi Perang"- telah diburu oleh negaranya sendiri yang telah dilindunginya. Dikhianati oleh pasangannya sendiri, dia difitnah sebagai sorang penghianat kemudian dijebloskan kedalam penjara. Di waktu-waktu terakhirnya, Jill memiliki banyak penyesalan, tapi ketika ajal sedang menjemputnya, dia tiba-tiba saja terbangun pada saat 6 tahun lalu. Dan kali ini, dia telah bertekad untuk tidak diperalat lagi.

Sekarang, sebagai seorang gadis berusia 10 tahun, Jill memutuskan untuk melarikan diri dari pertunangan dengan pangeran yang menghampirinya. Dan pada akhirnya, dia secara tidak sengaja melamar pria berumur 19 tahun yang dikenal sebagai kaisar naga hades theos rave, yang nantinya akan menghancurkan negaranya. Tapi tanpa disangka, dia malah menerima lamarannya!

Berbanding terbalik dengan ingatan Jill yang dulu, sekarang Jill melihat kalau Hades yang saat ini merupakan seorang kaisar yang sedang tidak beruntung.  Jadi bisakah Jill mencegah sang kaisar terjatuh kedalam jurang kegelapan? ataukah malah nasibnya sudah tidak bisa diubah lagi?

title.en: Neko ni wa Neko no Neko Gohan.

altTitles.en: My Kitten Is a Picky Eater.

altTitles.ja-ro: Neko ni wa Neko no Nekogohan.

description.en:
A kitten lies dying in the snow. It seems that it had eaten poisoned cat food.

When our protagonist, Mano Taiyou, chanced upon the kitten, he panicked and hurriedly brought it to the vet.

After being rescued, the kitten was taken in by Taiyou and given the name Yuki. Unfortunately, Yuki has been traumatized by its near death experience from eating the poisoned cat food and is now unable to eat dry kibbles.

This a heartwarming story of Yuki the cat and his owner, Taiyou as he struggles as a beginner cook to make home made food for Yuki.

altTitles.th: Biorg Trinity โรคร้ายกลายพันธุ์มนุษย์

altTitles.ja: バイオーグ・トリニティ

description.en: Opening holes in the palms of both hands, the “Bio Bug” disease enables people to absorb and then fuse with things they like. In a world made up of precarious balances, what will become of love, of youth? Here the curtain rises on a really incredible pair, delineated in a brand new youth-ensemble cast.

Summoned to purify the corruption spreading across Arad...?

Jinseong, a player who dedicated his life to "Dungeon & Fighter," is summoned to Arad by the transcendent Nemer and given the mission of becoming the Claw Master.

“You shall become the Claw Master and guide the blade through rightful trials.”

"I'll become the Claw Master or whatever it takes. I will survive in this Arad!"

Will DFO veteran Jinseong successfully complete his mission and return to the real world? The story of the Dark Knight Jinseong's quest to prevent the destruction of Arad begins!
In an old town coffee shop, a boy met an older high school girl. From there… an unforgettable summer began.

altTitles.ja-ro: BOX - Hako no Naka ni Nanika Iru

description.en:
Seven people received a "puzzle" and ticket from an unknown sender, and followed the ticket to a strange square house. A mysterious woman who came "out of curiosity" joined them, and what awaited those people in the house was a girl as beautiful as a doll and maze beyond imagination. They cannot leave unless they solve the puzzle. When it's solved, part of your body will disappear! Can they escape? And, just who invited them there?

From [Anilist](https://anilist.co/manga/113065/Box-Hako-no-Naka-ni-Nanika-Iru/)

Who am I? Where am I? What am I doing? Wait, wait! Great Alliance Leader! Stop it already!! I really…… am not the Cult Leader! The entirety of the Jianghu thought that the Cult Leader of the Demonic Cult was a woman—who would've thought that the Cult Leader could even secretly start a harem?!

title.en: Tensei Shitara Suterareta ga, Hirowarete Tanoshiku Ikiteimasu

altTitles.ja: 転生したら捨てられたが、拾われて楽しく生きています。

altTitles.ja-ro: Tensei Shitara Suterareta ga, Hirowarete Tanoshiku Ikiteimasu

description.en: Millie is reincarnated as a baby with memories of her previous life.However, at the age of five months, she is abandoned in the cold...! She was picked up by Joe and Marissa who happened to be passing by, and her life was saved, but the life of the common people in another world that awaits her is quite severe.... She finds herself in a dirty room full of dust and stains, without the delicious food she had in her previous life! The couple's restaurant and inn, "Cat's Pavilion in the Shade of the Trees," is in financial trouble! In order to return the favor she was given, she changes the store with her cheat magic and knowledge from her previous life...the long-awaited comic book version of the popular web novel!

Immediately after Gu Changge realized he had transgressed into a fantasy world, the world's protagonist, and fortune's chosen, vowed to take revenge on him. Envied by all, not only is the female lead head over heels for him, but he's also treated as a distinguished guest wherever he goes. Fortunately, Gu Changge's prestige and power are superior to everyone else's, so shouldn't it be easy to trample on a mere fortune's chosen?

Hold on… There’s a system dedicated to milking and harvesting the protagonist? Gu Changge smirked. “Seems like even fate wants me to fulfill my destiny as the villain of this world!”
description.fr: Dès que Gu Changge s’est rendu compte qu’il avait transgressé un monde imaginaire, le protagoniste de ce monde, l’élu de la fortune, a juré de se venger de lui. Envié par tous, non seulement la femme principale est folle de lui, mais il est également traité comme un invité de marque partout où il va. Heureusement, le prestige et le pouvoir de Gu Changge sont supérieurs à ceux de tous les autres, alors il ne devrait pas être facile de piétiner un simple élu de la fortune ?
description.id:
Begitu Gu Changge menyadari dia telah masuk ke sebuah dunia fantasi, protagonis dunia itu yang dengan beruntungnya terpilih, bersumpah untuk melakukan balas dendam terhadapnya. Semua orang sangat iri pada Protagonis itu, karena bukan hanya karakter utama wanita tergila-gila padanya, tapi dia juga selalu diperlakukan sebagai tamu kehormatan kemanapun dia pergi. Untungnya, martabat dan kekuatan Gu Changge jauh melebihi milik orang lain, sehingga dia tidak dengan mudah jatuh di tangan orang yang hanya terpilih karena keberuntungannya?

 

Tunggu dulu… ada sistem yang didedikasikan untuk meraup dan mengambil dari apa yang dimiliki protagonis? Gu Changge tersenyum. “Sepertinya takdir pun ingin aku memenuhi takdirku sebagai orang jahat di dunia ini!”
description.pl: Gu Changge zostaje przeniesiony do świata wuxia, gdzie z miejsca staje się obiektem nienawiści protagonisty, będącego Wybrańcem Losu, gdyż nie dość, że główna bohaterka rzuca mu się w ramiona, to jeszcze jest przez wszystkich traktowany niczym znamienity gość. Na szczęście jego postać cechuje znacząca siła, więc powinien bez trudu zmiażdżyć jakiegoś w czepku urodzonego dzieciaka, prawda? “Chwila… Otrzymałem wyspecjalizowany system, który pozwala mi okradać głównego bohatera ze szczęścia?” Gu Changge uśmiechnął się znacząco. “Zdaje się, że moim przeznaczeniem jest podążanie ścieżką prowadzącą do stania się największym czarnym charakterem w tym świecie!”
description.ru:
Гу Чангэ попадает в фэнтези-мир, где, по-классике, оказывается в шкуре главного козла отпущения.
Удивительно, что главный герой сразу же снизыскал расположение у императрицы, чем вызвал бурю ненависти в свой адрес. К счастью, Чангэ - уважаемый человек в городе и единственное, что его спасает от кары в данной ситуации это высокий статус в обществе. Подождите-ка... а вы уже знаете, что здесь есть необычная система рангов, в которой присутствуют яркие герои всех мастей? Проанализировав события, герой понимает, что выгоднее всего вжиться в свою новую роль и пойти по пути персонажа-злодея!
description.pt-br: Imediatamente após Gu Changge perceber que havia transmigrado para um mundo de fantasia, o protagonista do mundo, e o escolhido da fortuna, jurou se vingar dele. Invejado por todos, ele não só tem a liderança feminina de ponta-cabeça por ele, mas também é tratado como um distinto convidado onde quer que vá. Felizmente, o prestígio e o poder de Gu Changge são superiores aos de todos os outros, então não deveria ser fácil pisar em uma mera escolha da fortuna? Espere … Existe um sistema dedicado à ordenha e colheita do protagonista? Gu Changge sorriu. “Parece que até o destino quer que eu cumpra meu destino como o vilão deste mundo!”
